meanings.definition: The financial gain made in a transaction
meanings.sent1: The company's profits increased after a successful quarter.
meanings.sent2: Businesses aim to make profits to grow and expand.
meanings.sent3: The profits from selling lemonade at the stand were enough to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent4: Her hard work in the stock market yielded profits beyond her expectations.
meanings.sent5: The profits from the bake sale were enough to fund the school trip.

meanings.sent1: She profits from her daily exercise routine by staying healthy.
meanings.sent2: It is important to profit from constructive feedback to improve.
meanings.sent3: The students will profit greatly from the extra study session before the exam.
meanings.sent4: He will profit from the mentorship of experienced professionals in his field.
meanings.sent5: The team will profit from working together to achieve their common goal.
